name: Gardener (MoonTech)
description:
Gardener

Welcome to Gardener. This is a 2D Tower-Defense / Strategy game. Wild animals are on their way to attack all your plantations, hurry! Build up a team of defenders and demolish invaders! 

Important: For a better experience you might want to run this game on a full-screen mode (See the bottom right corner).

I would appreciate any feedbacks! Enjoy the game!

To download the game and see the source code, please visit my Github account: Gardener and follow the instructions in Readme file.
